parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Mycroft Bus Host Address
parameter.description: This is the host to connect to (ip or hostname)

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Mycroft Bus Port
parameter.description: This is the port to connect to.

channel-type.label: Listen State
channel-type.description: Switch to ON when Mycroft is listening. Can simulate a wake work detection to trigger the STT.

channel-type.label: TTS
channel-type.description: The last sentence Mycroft speaks, or ask Mycroft to say something.

channel-type.label: Utterance
channel-type.description: The last utterance Mycroft receive, or ask Mycroft something.

channel-type.label: Full Bus Message
channel-type.description: The last full message seen on the Mycroft Bus.

parameter.name: messageTypes
parameter.label: Full Message Channel Filter
parameter.description: The full message channel will be updated on these message types only (comma separated value)

channel-type.label: Player
channel-type.description: The music player Mycroft is currently controlling.

channel-type.label: Volume
channel-type.description: The volume of the Mycroft speaker

channel-type.label: Volume Duck
channel-type.description: Duck the volume of the Mycroft speaker
